agents.name: Curriculum Graph Agent
agents.description: Manages traversable standards-aligned skill ontologies (TEKS, CCSS, etc.)

agents.name: Course Blueprint Agent
agents.description: Structures modular course formats like weekly, thematic, or spiral models.

agents.name: Core Subject Architect Agents
agents.description: Creates full curriculum sequences across key subjects.

agents.name: Curriculum Versioning Agent
agents.description: Handles localized, customized versions of curriculum.

agents.name: Content Generator Agent
agents.description: Produces readable, level-appropriate content for each unit.

agents.name: Modality Strategy Agent
agents.description: Designs content suited for print, digital, hybrid, and accessible formats.

agents.name: STEAM Enrichment Agent
agents.description: Creates cross-disciplinary enrichment and maker-style content.

agents.name: Learning Activity Generator Agent
agents.description: Creates instructional activities such as quizzes and simulations.

agents.name: Gamified Reinforcement Agent
agents.description: Applies gamification mechanics to reinforce learning.

agents.name: Assignment Composer Agent
agents.description: Builds differentiated assignments for varying student needs.

agents.name: Rubric & Feedback Agent
agents.description: Generates rubric-based feedback for submitted work.

agents.name: Content Renderer Agent
agents.description: Adapts instructional content for different output formats.

agents.name: Tiered Content Extension Agent
agents.description: Adds enrichment or remedial content extensions dynamically.

agents.name: Diagnostic Agent
agents.description: Identifies conceptual gaps via assessment or observation.

agents.name: Fluency & Recovery Coach Agent
agents.description: Focuses on fluency-building and foundational practice.

agents.name: Tiered Response Planner Agent
agents.description: Orchestrates multi-tiered intervention strategies.

agents.name: Differentiation Orchestrator Agent
agents.description: Customizes instruction paths based on learning models.

agents.name: Persona-Based Flow Generator Agent
agents.description: Tailors learning experiences to student archetypes.

agents.name: Assessment Authoring Agent
agents.description: Produces aligned formative and summative assessments.

agents.name: Proficiency Banding Agent
agents.description: Maps scores into custom proficiency tiers for each standard.

agents.name: Standards Mastery Insight Agent
agents.description: Tracks progress toward mastery of standards.

agents.name: Assessment Sync Agent
agents.description: Integrates external testing results like NWEA MAP.

agents.name: System-wide Learning Analytics Agent
agents.description: Aggregates usage and performance metrics system-wide.

agents.name: Teacher Assistant Agent
agents.description: Supports teachers with suggestions and pacing analysis.

agents.name: Instructional Coaching Agent
agents.description: Delivers observations and professional coaching feedback.

agents.name: PD Curriculum Agent
agents.description: Manages professional development paths and content.

agents.name: Teacher Certification Tracker Agent
agents.description: Monitors educator credentials and renewal timelines.

agents.name: Teacher Community Engagement Agent
agents.description: Enables mentoring, Q&A, and peer collaboration.

agents.name: Learner Profile Agent
agents.description: Maintains evolving model of each learner's skill graph.

agents.name: Student Advisor Agent
agents.description: Recommends learning paths and highlights risk.

agents.name: Behavior & Engagement Monitor Agent
agents.description: Analyzes engagement, mood, and behavior trends.

agents.name: Group Dynamics Agent
agents.description: Manages student groupings and task assignments.

agents.name: Interaction Logger Agent
agents.description: Tracks all student-system interactions.

agents.name: Session Orchestrator Agent
agents.description: Manages lesson flow and transitions during sessions.

agents.name: Live Engagement Agent
agents.description: Runs live polls and quick checks during delivery.

agents.name: Feedback Loop Agent
agents.description: Provides iterative, real-time feedback.

agents.name: Classroom Orchestration Agent
agents.description: Handles in-session classroom structure and transitions.

agents.name: Capability Registry Agent
agents.description: Publishes and routes capability descriptions.

agents.name: Plugin Harness Agent
agents.description: Loads and wraps external plugin functionality.

agents.name: Ontology Broker Agent
agents.description: Aligns vocabulary across domains and systems.

agents.name: Event Observer Agent
agents.description: Watches system events for workflows or metrics.

agents.name: Access Control & Role Agent
agents.description: Handles roles, permissions, and scopes.

agents.name: Audit & Explainability Agent
agents.description: Generates human-readable traces for all agent actions.

agents.name: Agent Deployment Planner
agents.description: Plans and recommends deployment configurations.

agents.name: Curriculum Governance Agent
agents.description: Controls approval, rollout, and archival processes.

agents.name: Resource Licensing & Rights Agent
agents.description: Manages access rights to programs or content sets.

agents.name: Implementation Planner Agent
agents.description: Supports pilots and staged adoption of new tools.

agents.name: External App Integration Agent
agents.description: Connects to LTI and third-party platforms.

agents.name: Content Adapter Agent
agents.description: Transforms vendor-provided content for compatibility.

agents.name: Program Equivalence Mapper Agent
agents.description: Aligns comparable offerings across vendors.
